name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lucia Crimson Abyss Punishing Gray Raven Live Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Elevate your Chrome tabs with the dynamic Lucia Crimson Abyss live wallpaper, minimalist design, and a seamless browsing experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Elevate your Chrome tabs with the dynamic Lucia Crimson Abyss live wallpaper, minimalist design, and a seamless browsing experience.

The Lucia Crimson Abyss Punishing Gray Raven Live Wallpaper extension brings the fierce elegance of Lucia from Punishing: Gray Raven directly to your Chrome new tabs. Featuring a captivating live wallpaper of Lucia in her Crimson Abyss form, this extension immerses you in the thrilling, futuristic world of the game. The vivid motion and striking visuals make every new tab a dynamic experience.
